name: schedule(after:interval:tolerance:options:_:)
desc: Performs the action at some time after the specified date, at the specified frequency, using the specified tolerance and options.
declaration: func schedule(after date: DispatchQueue.SchedulerTimeType, interval: DispatchQueue.SchedulerTimeType.Stride, tolerance: DispatchQueue.SchedulerTimeType.Stride, options: DispatchQueue.SchedulerOptions?, _ action: @escaping () -> Void) -> Cancellable
